title: Validate subject Line is not recorded in alerts/events; when user1@foo.com is DO Not match in constraint profile configured
custom_steps:
- Enable webui feature flag and enable smtp feature flag
- enable record subject line status to enable in UI and constraint profile selected with "user1@foo.com" to DO NOT Match  
- Generate email traffic from_user as "user1@foo.com" 
- review that contraint profile is matched as exclusion and hence subject record is disabled
- verify smtp send ASP connections to DLP and final event object json has subject as empty string
- verify Skope IT app events, alerts and dlp incidents page to evalute subject Line recorded as empty string
- verify Title in incidents value should have object_id + from_user
custom_expected:
- verify smtp send ASP connections to DLP and final event object json has subject 
- verify Skope IT app events, alerts and dlp incidents page to evalute subject Line recorded correctly
- verify Title in incidents value should have subject line recorded from email subject
- verify No smtp or DLP service crash
